targets.expr: max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="VirtualService", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="VirtualService", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="ServiceEntry", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="ServiceEntry", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="DestinationRule", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="DestinationRule", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="WorkloadEntry", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="WorkloadEntry", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="AuthorizationPolicy", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="AuthorizationPolicy", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="PeerAuthentication", event="add", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{type="PeerAuthentication", event="delete", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) or max(up{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} * 0))

istio_requests_total{reporter="source", response_code!~"5.*", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"} / istio_requests_total{reporter="source", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}
(sum(istio_requests_total{response_code=~"4.*", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) / sum(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}))
(sum(istio_requests_total{response_code=~"5.*", job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) / sum(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}))

panels.description: Delay in seconds between config change and a proxy receiving all required configuration
panels.title: Delay between config change and a proxy receiving configuration

Number of conflicting inbound listeners.
Number of conflicting wildcard http listeners with current wildcard tcp listener.
Number of conflicting wildcard tcp listeners with current wildcard http listener.
Number of conflicting tcp listeners with current tcp listener.

panels.title: Conflicting listeners

panels.title: Total number of sidecar injection requests

panels.description: The number of CSR received by the Istio Citadel component
panels.title: Number of CSRs received by Citadel

panels.description: The unix timestamp, in seconds, when Citadel root cert will expire. A negative time indicates the cert is expired
panels.title: Time to Citadel root cert expiry

panels.description: The number of certificates issued that Citadel has served successfully
